name: Color Base
description:
Color Base is a puzzle and 2d platformer where you need to choose correct boxes and reach destination with your partner.

Once a box is choosen it becomes useless for your partner and so the difficulty rises, play to explore what lies within.

Small game with interactive interface, design, sfx and controls, maybe :)

Can't solve the puzzle ? Watch walkthrough from levels tab, yet its not recommended but "who cares" ;)

Currently there are 5 levels in the game, more will come with the with next update.

Play the game and provide feedback or recommendations in comments or through Email.

Don't forget to play tutorial "Menu > Settings > Play Tutorial" or from PopUp
